sentences.en: An inquiry was set up to determine the cause of the accident.
sentences.cn: 已展开调查以确定事故原因。

sentences.en: As a result of the inquiry, two students have been sent down.
sentences.cn: 调查结果, 两个学生被开除了.

sentences.en: Counselors began an inquiry into industrial needs.
sentences.cn: 顾问们开始调查工业方面的需要.

sentences.en: He's now the subject of an official inquiry.
sentences.cn: 他现在是官方调查的对象。

sentences.en: I don’t know who sent the gift, but I’ll make some inquiries.
sentences.cn: 我不知道礼物是谁送的，但我会打听一下。

sentences.en: Isherwood was at the court of inquiry to hear the evidence.
sentences.cn: 伊舍伍德在调查法庭听取证据。

sentences.en: Many parents have been pressing for an inquiry into the problem.
sentences.cn: 许多家长迫切要求调查这个问题.

sentences.en: Objective Inquiry into the heavy asphyxiation rescues measure of the new born.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的探讨新生儿重度窒息抢救的措施.

sentences.en: Officers had tailed the gang from London during a major undercover inquiry.
sentences.cn: 在一次重大的秘密调查行动中，警察从伦敦就盯上了那帮匪徒。

sentences.en: On further inquiry, it emerged that Malcolm had not been involved in the incident.
sentences.cn: 进一步的调查表明，马尔科姆没有参与该事件。

sentences.en: The allegations against them were made in sworn evidence to the inquiry.
sentences.cn: 在调查取得的宣誓证词中对他们提出了指控。

sentences.en: The field of inquiry has narrowed down to five persons.
sentences.cn: 调查的范围已经缩小到只剩5个人了.

sentences.en: The inquiry found that the company had seriously underspent on safety equipment.
sentences.cn: 调查发现，公司对安全设备的投资严重不足。

sentences.en: The inquiry is by no means cut and dried.
sentences.cn: 调查之事远未盖棺定论。

sentences.en: The inquiry team criticises staff at the psychiatric hospital for the low standard of care.
sentences.cn: 调查小组批评该精神病院的员工护理水平低劣。

sentences.en: The local council set up a committee of inquiry to look into policing arrangements.
sentences.cn: 当地市政会成立了一个调查委员会来对治安维护措施进行调查。

sentences.en: The police have launched a murder inquiry.
sentences.cn: 警方已开始对谋杀案展开调查

sentences.en: These are questions that lie outside the purview of our inquiry.
sentences.cn: 这些都不是属于我们调查范围的问题.

sentences.en: They make a quick response to my inquiry.
sentences.cn: 他们对我的询问很快作了答复.

words.tran_cn: 询问的；打听的；爱追究的

phrases.tran_cn: 调查，查询；对…的调查；询问

trans.tran_cn: 调查，审查，询问，质问，质询，追究，探究，打听
trans.tran_en: a question you ask in order to get information
